languages.text: "Мейв, ты была к не{rt_mf|му|й} ближе всех. Как {rt_mf|он|она} с тобой обращал{rt_mf|ся|ась}?"

traits.locale_text: "Мейв, ты была к нему ближе всех. Как он с тобой обращался?"

languages.text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"
languages.original_text: "Мейв, ты была к не{rt_mf|му|й} ближе всех. Как {rt_mf|он|она} с тобой обращал{rt_mf|ся|ась}?"

"Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"

languages.text: “梅芙，你比其他人都更接近{rt_mf|他|她}，{rt_mf|他|她}是怎么对待你的？”
languages.original_text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"

traits.locale_text: “梅芙，你比其他人都更接近{rt_mf|他|她}，{rt_mf|他|她}是怎么对待你的？”

languages.text: «Maive, has estado más cerca que ninguno de los presentes. ¿Qué tal te trató?».
languages.original_text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"

traits.locale_text: «Maive, has estado más cerca que ninguno de los presentes. ¿Qué tal te trató?».

languages.text: "Maive, sen ona buradaki herkesten daha çok yaklaştın. Sana nasıl davrandı?"
languages.original_text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"

traits.locale_text: "Maive, sen ona buradaki herkesten daha çok yaklaştın. Sana nasıl davrandı?"

languages.text: 「メイヴ、お前はここにいる他の誰よりも天の{rt_mf|君|姫}の近くにいたけど、あの人はお前をどう扱ったんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"

traits.locale_text: 「メイヴ、お前はここにいる他の誰よりも天の{rt_mf|君|姫}の近くにいたけど、あの人はお前をどう扱ったんだ？」

languages.text: « Maive, c'est toi qui t'es le plus rapprochée {rt_mf|de lui|d'elle}. Comment t'a-t-{rt_mf|il|elle} traitée ? »
languages.original_text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"

traits.locale_text: « Maive, c'est toi qui t'es le plus rapprochée {rt_mf|de lui|d'elle}. Comment t'a-t-{rt_mf|il|elle} traitée ? »

languages.text: "Maive, Ihr wart {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} näher als jeder andere hier. Wie hat {rt_mf|er|sie} Euch behandelt?"
languages.original_text: "Maive, you got closer to {rt_mf|him|her} than anyone else here. How did {rt_mf|he|she} treat you?"
